text: "Forever Young" is a 1984 song by German band Alphaville and is the title track to their debut studio album Forever Young. It went to number 1 in Sweden and was very popular in German language countries. It has been covered by numerous artists since its release. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Synth-pop songs Category:Alphaville songs Category:Laura Branigan songs Category:Becky Hill songs Category:David Guetta songs Category:Ava Max songs Category:Imagine Dragons songs
title: Forever Young (Alphaville song)
